app.title: GAME CENTER
app.subtitle: Select a game (long press for description)
app.exitConfirm: Do you want to exit Game Center?

tetris.name: Tetris
tetris.subtitle: Tetris
tetris.description: Rotate and place falling blocks to complete horizontal lines. Game over when blocks reach the top!
tetris.objectiveDesc:
Place falling blocks to complete horizontal lines.
Completed lines disappear and you earn points.
tetris.controlsDesc:
• ←→ : Move block left/right
• ↓ : Move block down faster
• Rotate button : Rotate block 90°
• Drop button : Drop block instantly
tetris.scoringDesc:
• 1 line: 100 points
• 2 lines: 300 points
• 3 lines: 500 points
• 4 lines (Tetris): 800 points
tetris.gameOverDesc: The game ends when blocks reach the ceiling.

gomoku.name: Gomoku
gomoku.subtitle: Five in a Row
gomoku.description: Black and white take turns placing stones. First to get 5 in a row horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins.

othello.name: Othello
othello.subtitle: Reversi
othello.description: Flip opponent's pieces by sandwiching them. The player with more pieces when the board is full wins.

chess.name: Chess
chess.subtitle: Chess
chess.description: Classic strategy board game. Checkmate the opponent's king to win.

janggi.name: Janggi
janggi.subtitle: Korean Chess
janggi.description: Traditional Korean board game. Capture the opponent's general to win.

solitaire.name: Solitaire
solitaire.subtitle: Klondike
solitaire.description: Classic Klondike Solitaire. Stack all cards by suit from Ace to King to win.

minesweeper.name: Minesweeper
minesweeper.subtitle: Minesweeper
minesweeper.description: Use number hints to reveal all safe cells. Step on a mine and it's game over!

baseball.name: Number Baseball
baseball.subtitle: Bulls and Cows
baseball.description: Guess the hidden number using strike and ball hints.

onecard.name: One Card
onecard.subtitle: Crazy Eights
onecard.description: Play cards one at a time. First to empty their hand wins.

yutnori.name: Yutnori
yutnori.subtitle: Korean Board Game
yutnori.description: Traditional Korean board game. Throw yut sticks and move all your pieces to the goal to win.

hula.name: Hula
hula.subtitle: Hwatu Card Game
hula.description: Korean flower card game. Combine cards and be the first to play all your cards to win.

sudoku.name: Sudoku
sudoku.subtitle: Sudoku
sudoku.description: Fill the 9x9 grid with numbers 1-9. Each row, column, and 3x3 box must contain no duplicates.
sudoku.quickInputGuide: Number {num} selected - Tap cell to input
sudoku.eraseMode: Erase mode - Tap cell to erase

numberSums.name: Number Sums
numberSums.subtitle: Number Sums
numberSums.description: Fill in the blanks using the sum hints for rows and columns.

dialog.savedGameMessage:
You have a saved game.
Would you like to continue?
dialog.undoMessage: Watch an ad to use undo?
dialog.hintMessage: Watch an ad to use hint?
